ygData.subject: Re: What to buy?
ygData.msgSnippet: well this is what im wearing,  im not sure if i have all of the top of the line gear but it works ok for me. foremans tunic, 3 str, 3 wis serpentine bracer
ygData.messageBody:
well this is what im wearing, im not sure if i have all of the top of the
line gear but it works ok for me.

foremans tunic, 3 str, 3 wis
serpentine bracer 3dex (not really useful) 9agi
bracer of erollisi 5 str
2 jagged bands 3str 5 ac
2 golden amber earrings 3 str
mesh pants ( i think they look better than cured silk)
fur lined shoes
mesh sleeves (trying to get a lupine armband thing)
mesh cap
for the neck i had a 3 dex necklace, but since thats not so useful and im
kinda broke right now, i stuck in a 4 int necklace, spiked collar would go
well here
wu's fighting gauntlets
raw silk shoulders
silvered star ruby veil 5 dex, 5 cha (im going to switch to a silver ruby
veil which is 4 str 4 wis)
mesh cape

i think thats all the equipment slots, ive had all this stuff since lvl 16 so
i really think i need to upgrade too, so can anyone tell me what i should get
next? thanks in advance

Raykwon lvl 32[ Arcanis Spectare] Innoruuk
